case.state: By the way you can all call me... Flutter!
Nice to meet you! I'm Flutter.
So here we are...the Inventory, At least, I think that's what this is.
Moth?! I'm a butterfly! When have you ever seen a moth sparkle like this!?
I am NOT a moth! I am a butterfly! Moths aren't this brightly colored! Are they?
This place reminds me of Port Puerto.
Oh, wow! It's a lot like the refreshment bar at the Port Puerto beach!
The beach is a nice place. Calm yet exciting!
Being at the beach makes me think of Olivia...
Ooh! This is just like the Origin Island hot springs!
This'll be so relaxing! Just like the hot springs on Origin Island!
Whoa! It's like a castle in here!
Wow! This place is furnished like a castle!
What a cozy little room.
I like this room. It feels welcoming.
There's so much that I could learn from this place!
I wonder which of these books are the most interesting...
Ooh. It's like the deep Elderwood here.
It's a little hard to see when it's this dark...
I want to know about all the different kinds of Life, so I'll be going around asking everyone!
I can't wait to see what this place has got in store for us!
I hope that we can all become the best of friends!
I'm here to gather wishes from everyone!
Oh, it's actually very interesting, Tomo! It feels so light and ethereal!
Oh, I inherited them, Tomo. My mother and father are magical too!
I got them from my parents, Tomo. My dad created the world, and my mom gave happiness to living things!
I'm good for now.
I don't need to trade any cards.
I'm happy with what I have.
I'm good for now.
I don't need to trade any cards.
I'm happy with what I have.
Just one should work.
I'll take one new card, please.
One card will do.
I'll exchange these ~cards~ cards.
These ~cards~ cards can go.
Uh, take these ~cards~ cards back.
Let's see... these ones!
I'll trade these ~cards~ cards.
I think these ~cards~ can go...
I won't need these ~cards~ cards.
I'll swap these ~cards~ cards out.
I'll take ~cards~ new cards, please!
Um, maybe these ~cards~ cards?
Uh, I think I'll go with these ~cards~.
I think I can lose these ~cards~ cards.
Cool! All of these have the same symbol on them!
Wow! The same shape is on all of these!
Ooh, I'm so excited! I wonder what everyone else's cards are like!
I think this hand is good! This hand is good, right?
Wonderful!
Oh wow! Thank you kindly, dealer!
Wow! These are great!
Amazing! I'll definitely win with these!
I'm not out of the game yet!
I can still win!
There's still hope for me!
This is amazing!
I got really lucky this time!
Oh wow! This is perfect!
Oh! This is just what I needed!
Perfect!
What a stroke of luck!
Are these good? It's hard to hold them as a butterfly.
These seem alright.
I'm not sure I understand the game yet. Is this good?
Hmmm. This is fine.
These cards aren't so bad.
This should work.
Hmmm. I can't be sure.
I'm not sure if I can win with these.
Maybe. Just maybe.
This should be enough.
I shouldn't need any more than this.
I think this is enough to keep me safe.
Oh my! Anything could happen with this!
This could really go either way.
I can't really be sure with this one.
I'm only just starting out... It can't end like this!
~Player~, the dealer is a big meanie! He won't give me any good cards!
I don't think these are good.
Uh-oh...
I was hoping for a better quality hand.
Uh-oh. This doesn't look good.
Oh well. I guess this just isn't my round.
I guess I made a mistake that time.
This looks like it might be it for me.
Is this where I lose?
This looks like a losing hand.
Oops. That was a bad decision.
Eh, maybe I should've kept those.
Well, this isn't good.
Oh no! I messed up!
There's a good chance that I won't be winning this time.
Ehehe... um... oops.
Ooh! I have, Aella! It was wild! But I made a lot of friends in the process and that's what's really important!
I have, Aella! It was a lot of fun! In fact, that's why I'm here, to have more fun!
Luck boosting? I'm not wearing anything like that. Only elemental enhancers.
I'm not wearing anything like that. All of my equipment is meant to make my magic better, Dust.
I know, right, Pit! Hot springs are just so relaxing!
What do you mean "ruin it", Pit? We're not going to ruin anything by playing a friendly, fun game.
But, don't you need your hands for most jobs you do?
I'm not sure I understand, Spooky. What kind if job do you have?
Well, I spent a lot of time in the Castele library Aella, and I thought that all the books were pretty interesting.
Oh! There were plenty of interesting books in the Castele library, Aella! I can bring you with me the next time I go if you want.
Oh, wow. I wonder how it compares to the wands my friend makes.
Wow! That sounds like something really rare, Akko. How'd you get it?
Oh wow. You're very different from the zombies I usually see. You're very composed, Saki.
Oh wow! You're so much more lively than all the other zombies I've seen, Saki!
Well, hello, Alter Ego. Are you a sentient tome?
Hello, Alter Ego. You remind me of the Tome of Shadows in the Al Maajik library.
I... don't think it is, Natsuki. I can see them. They're pink with a strawberry pattern.
Natsuki, are you sure? Because I'm pretty sure I can see them.
Of course I can play! Just... give me a second to get my cards in order.
Yes I can play! I just... might have some trouble holding these...
Ooh! If you need help getting them to smile, I'd be happy to help, Akko!
I can help you get those smiles, Akko!
Of course I would, Tomoko! We all make mistakes, after all.
I've lied to my friends before, Tomoko. But they all forgave me, so of course I could forgive you!
That's incredible, Akko! It's wonderful that you're pursuing your greatest wish in Life!
That's amazing, Akko! You must be so happy working towards your Wish.
Well, I'm not even sure they can feel pain, since they're basically just a doll, but I thought that we had broken him for a minute.
It was weird, since it wasn't a person, it was a doll. Though, I was afraid we had broken him at first.
Well, you shouldn't drink too much at once. A small dish is usually enough.
You can't have too much of it at once, just a little bit is enough for me.
I didn't understand a lot of that, but it sounds like you're busy, Meia.
I, uh... I see. Do you really have time to be playing a game like this, Meia?
Oh, well that's a relief. Not that you would be unarmed! Just that nothing awful would happen.
I'm sure you'll be fine without it, Meia. You should just try to have fun with the game.
Oh. I'm so sorry to hear that, Emi.
Oh my. I'm sorry that happened to you, Emi.
Oh. I'm so sorry to hear that, Emi.
Oh my. I'm sorry that happened to you, Emi.
It's not stupid, Fidget. It's just... unique.
That's not very nice, Fidget. It... goes well with the rest of his clothes.
It is?! What master Cook made that, Joey?
Is it really, Joey? Who made it?
A school for magic? Oh, so it's like what Jinx does!
Military? So you do a lot of fighting, Misato? What's that like?
You're in the military, Misato? What's that like for you?
Yebisu? What's that, Misato?
What's a "Yebisu", Misato?
And, uh, what exactly is 3.0 + 1.0, Misato?
Is that supposed to be code for something, Misato? What exactly does that mean?
That? What is that, Misato?
And, uh, what is that, Misato?
What is NERV, Misato? Is it important?
Is that bad, Misato?
Whitewings? What are those, Catria?
What are the Whitewings, Catria?
What's that thing, Meia? What're you doing with it?
What's that thing on your arm, Meia?
Why? What would happen if it did malfunction, Meia?
And, uh... if it did malfunction, Meia, what would happen?
Uh, actually Jessie, I technically am a human.
Well, despite the whole butterfly thing, I'm still technically human, Jessie.
Hmm?
Anything? Well, I guess I could buy a few presents for everyone.
Is there someone who's always judging you, Jessie?
Oh! I see! ...what are "cigarettes", Jessie?
A talking sword? Just like Durandal! What kind of legendary blacksmith forged you, Ahrah?
Hey! I know another talking sword! It was made by a legendary Blacksmith apparently. Is it the same for you, Ahrah?
Oh, well Fidget, you're a very interesting... uh, what are you?
That's neat, but, what exactly are you, Fidget?
Well, never a frog, but I've been bitten by my fair share of dragons...
Oh. So, your mother is gone too, Estelle?
Your mom is gone too, Estelle?
Oh. So, your mother is gone too, Estelle?
Your mom is gone too, Estelle?
A Thompson- what? I don't know what that is, Tomo.
And uh... what exactly is that, Tomo?
So then, is this like a date for the two of you, then?
Oh. So, why did she seem upset, Miko?
Of course I can talk, why wouldn't I, Rin?
Why yes, I did! Nice to meet you! I'm Flutter!
I'm here to enjoy a fun game! What about you, Rin?
This game seemed like fun! So I decided to join in!
Magic, Jessie! It's simple as long as you practice!
It's a spell that my father gave to me, Jessie!
I do it because I love Life, Tomoko. And I enjoy seeing people living their best Life!
No, just the butterfly, Tomoko. Though, my friend will collect some cicadas from time to time.
Funny you ask, Fidget. I actually have had to do something like that before. And I did, so... yes?
I'd have to say "yes" to that, Fidget. Mainly because something like that has happened before.
I would give them a hug, and reassure them until they felt better, Fidget.
I would hug them, and let them know that it wasn't their fault, Fidget.
That's easy, Fidget! Sugared water!
I love sugared water, Fidget!
Backdoor? I mean, if the main door is locked, then why not?
The backdoor of where, Jessie?
Well, I have a secret or two, but I wouldn't call them "dark."
I don't have any deep dark secrets, but I have a few regular secrets, Jessie/
Hmmm... The whole butterfly thing was my main secret, to be honest.
You mean, besides the butterfly thing, Jessie? No, not really.
Family is extremely important to me. Even if we don't always get along, we all still love each other.
Family is one of the things I hold closest to my heart, Jessie. My sister, my father, my mother... they're all very important to me.
Family is extremely important to me. Even if we don't always get along, we all still love each other.
Family is one of the things I hold closest to my heart, Jessie. My sister, my father, my mother... they're all very important to me.
I try to avoid lying as much as I can, Jessie. Lying makes my heart ache.
I've done something like that once before, Jessie, and it made me feel awful.
Is that a lot? I don't know. I'm not usually the person handling money.
I'm not sure... What is "porn", Jessie?
"Porn"? What's that, Jessie?
Smokers? You mean like the cooking tool? I mean, they're okay, but an oven usually works better, right?
Smokers? Well, the food that gets made with them usually comes out a little dusty, but it's still pretty good.
People can change, Jessie. Of course I wouldn't hold it against them.
I wouldn't want other people doing that to me, so I wouldn't do it to them, Jessie.
Why can't we still be friends, L'Arachel? Isn't that the whole point of a game?
What do you mean "better circumstances", L'Arachel? We're already playing a friendly game together, aren't we?
Yeah, I know how to use magic. Why do you ask, L'Arachel?
Of course I can use magic, L'Arachel. Mostly healing magic, but I can use some attacks too.
I can't do that, Megumin. Also, why "unholy" magic?
Well, my father would probably be able to give me the ability to do that, but I haven't asked him because the butterfly has been enough.
Despite my abilities, I'm technically a human girl, Megumin.
I'm just a girl, Megumin. My dad gave me the ability to become a butterfly.
No, not exactly, Mae. My mom was a goddess, and my dad is the creator. But I'm just a girl
No. Well, yes, but... You don't sound very happy very happy about that, Mae.
Hm? What do you mean, Mae? What's wrong with me playing?
Oh? Should I not be, Mae? Why not?
Hey! I'm here to play the game too, Nami! Just hold on a minute...
What do you mean "wait for it to leave"? I'm here to play the game!
I'm not as frail as I may look as a butterfly, Nami! Though this form is preferable for actually doing things.
Well, I'm not as tough while I'm a butterfly, but it would still take more than that to actually hurt me, Nami.
Oh, this? I made it with my mother when I was very little, Rin.
I made it along with my mother, Rin. It's a nice memento of her.
I'm from Lunares, Jessie. Well, I think it's called the moon here.
I'm from the other side of the moon, Jessie! Though, I just call it Lunares.

This "bug" has feelings, you know! Stop being so mean!

Three times? Today must not be my day!
Three times in a row! I must be having a really bad day!

What going on? How is this even happening?

I guess my luck just isn't as good as I thought.
I guess I can't always win.
Whoops! Looks like I lost.

All of you are really good at this!

I mean, it's not a big deal. My dad just made a few universes and my mom gave people the ability to live their Life to the fullest.

Everyone, stand back.

This should work...

It doesn't work on me, but when someone else wears this necklace, it helps them learn things faster.
This talisman is very special. When other people wear it, they can learn new things much faster than normal!
This necklace can help people learn things really quickly. I have a spare if anyone wants it.

This sash is imbued with Fire Mana+! That means that fire attacks do very little to me.

My panties are all that's left.

No, not souls, Megumin. He just grows trees, fruits and magic.
I swear, it's nothing like that, Megumin.
In situations like that, I can only hope that they learn from their mistakes, Tomo.
Okay, Tomoko. Hold on, one second.
I guess, I just always look for the good in things, Tomo.
I'm really not sure, Tomo. I suppose, I just always try to find the good in things.
Degrade? What do you mean, Tomo? This is a friendly game, isn't it?
What do you mean "degrading myself", Tomo? Nobody likes to lose, but you can't let that get in the way of having fun!

A-nal? What are you talking about, Panty?

Anyway, let's keep going!
Now then, the game must go on!

I have to be careful now.
If I lose again, I'm out.
It's starting to look more and more like I'll lose this.

I really only ever use Light Magic, though. I mostly wear it for defensive purposes.
It's really only useful for defense on me. Since I really only use Light Magic.
They also keep my feet from getting sore. Though, I'm not really sure how they do that.
The Earth Element helps with healing, which is great since that's one of my specialties!
The affinity with Earth makes my healing magic much more powerful!
That's weird. I'm actually feeling kind of embarrassed about this.
This is a little embarrassing. But I'm still having fun!
I feel a bit embarrassed, but I want to keep having fun with the game!

It looks like I'm not doing very good.

"N"? What an interesting name... Or is it a nickname?
You seem to talk about food quite a bit, Pit. What kind of food do you like? I personally prefer sweet things, myself.

case.state: You're a goddess too, right Zizou? I can feel it!
Gasp Another goddess! Are you here to have fun too, Zizou?
The way you made those clothes appear out of nowhere, you must be in the Tailor Life, Rarity!
It's great that you seem so proud of yourself as a Tailor, Rarity! Madam Purl says more Tailors need that kind of attitude!
The way you made those clothes appear out of nowhere, you must be in the Tailor Life, Rarity!
It's great that you seem so proud of yourself as a Tailor, Rarity! Madam Purl says more Tailors need that kind of attitude!
You sure do look like an adventurer, Aella! What kind of adventures do you like to go on?
If you're an adventurer, Aella, then I've got a good friend who could help you prepare for your next adventure!
Gasp You're a Public Performer, Joey!? I've been dying to meet someone who had taken on that Life!
Wow! A Performer! That's such a rare Life! What's it like, Joey?
You said you were a Magician, Sayaka? That's neat! What's your rank?
You keep on saying something about a witch, Sayaka, what's that all about?
Well, let's see them then, Sayaka!
Go on then, Sayaka. Let's see them!
You're also a goddess, Palutena? What are the odds!? Are you here to have fun?
Another goddess? This will be great! Let's try to have fun with this Palutena!
Isn't that advanced Magician's equipment that you're wearing Megumin? You must be so talented at magic! And at such a young age!
You're a Magician, aren't you Megumin? I can tell by that Magician gear that you're wearing.
You keep talking explosions, Megumin. I bet you'd get along great with Flannel! He's an Alchemist that loves making bombs!
So. If you only use magic, then your stamina is probably a problem, Megumin. I bet my friend could make a few SP potions to help with that.
You're definitely getting worried about something, Megumin. Maybe you'll feel better if you talk about it?
So, since you're a goddess, Zizou what exactly can you do? Besides that pretty butterfly trick.
You seem so calm and cool, Zizou. You're a lot like my sister, Noelia, in that regard.
A Spooky! Oh. Your name is Spooky. Sorry.
A Spooky! Oh. Your name is Spooky. Sorry.
So, are you actually wearing clothes, Spooky? Or, are they just a part of your body?
Do you even have clothes that you can take off, Spooky?
Your pantyhose first? I mean, I guess you could, but why does it matter?
Yeah, I suppose you can, but isn't that just more trouble?
Hey, Tomoko. I've been wondering... Do you get enough sleep?
Say, Tomoko? Do you keep your hair messy like that on purpose?
Oh, wow! Your hair is so pretty!
I don't think I've ever seen a blue person before!
Oh, wow! You seem so fancy, Miko!
Your entire outfit is so fancy and pretty, Miko!
(Here she comes again.)
(There she is again.)
You're a very energetic person, Saki! This'll be so much fun!
I love how energetic you are, Saki! I hope you stay that way!
Oh! You're so adorable Chihiro! So cute!
Such a cute girl! You're adorable, Chihiro!
Are you sure you're okay, Chihiro? Do you really want to keep playing?
You're sure you want to keep going, Chihiro?
Are you sure you're okay, Chihiro? Do you really want to keep playing?
You're sure you want to keep going, Chihiro?
So, what exactly are those things you've been eating, Erufuda?
So, those things are "french fries"? I've never seen a dish like those before.
Ooh! You look so fluffy and cute, Leggy!
Wow! You look all soft and cuddly, Leggy!
You seem like such a calm person, Rin. How do you like surprises?
You're so calm and collected, Rin. Are you the kind of person who doesn't like surprises?
Oh my! You're name is Sola, right? You're so adorable!
Aww! Sola is so cute! Are you here to have some fun too, Sola?
Try to stay calm, Sola. Take some deep breaths.
You don't have to panic, Sola. This is just a friendly game.
What's wrong, Misato? Do you need for us to stop for a moment?
Is everything alright, Misato? Do you want to take a short break?
You look like you're very scared, Misato. Can I do anything to help you calm down?
Everything will be fine, Misato. Just take a deep breath.
That armor looks so heavy, Aella! Does it ever cause problems for you?
Your armor is so pretty, Aella! But, isn't it really heavy?
Hey, Meia? I understand competitiveness, but don't you think you might be taking this a little too seriously?
Uh, Meia? I think you might be taking this a little too seriously. This is just a friendly game, after all.
You said that you're a Pilot, right Meia? What kind of crafts can you fly?
So you're a commander, Meia? What's that like? Being in charge of so many people?
Hey, Meia. That thing that you took off earlier. What exactly did it do?
Meia, that thing that you took off earlier. You seemed pretty attached to it. Was it important?
You've said a couple of times that you're feeling embarrassed, but you seem to be perfectly calm to me, Meia.
You've played this game before, right Meia? What do you think? Isn't it more fun with some new people?
I get the feeling that you're really on edge right now, Natsuki. Maybe try taking some deep breaths?
You seem to be really aggravated over something, Natsuki. Do you want to talk about it?
Natsuki, maybe it would help if you just tried to enjoy yourself.
You would probably feel better if you gave yourself a chance to actually enjoy the game, Natsuki.
Ooh! That's pretty neat, Natsuki! You must be pretty smart to know all that!
So you do a lot of reading, right Natsuki? I like reading too! What types of books do you read?
You enjoy reading, don't you, Natsuki? What kind of books would you recommend?
Is it hot where you live, Jura? Your clothes make it seem like it.
So, what benefits do those clothes provide you, Jura? They don't look like they protect much.
I really like your bow, Sayori! Is it special in any way?
So you enjoy reading books, Sayori? Does that mean that you're a Scholar?
Hey, Sayori? Is everything okay? Something about the way you're acting feels...off.
Sayori, I feel like the way you're acting is a bit strange. Is something wrong?
Sayori, something is definitely bothering you. Please, tell us what's wrong.
Sayori, you look like you're scared. Don't be afraid to say something, okay?
It's so impressive that you're a Hero, Ochako! That must have taken a lot of work to achieve!
That's some really cool-looking equipment you're wearing, Ochako! Does it do anything special?
I'm still fascinated by your outfit, Ochako. Who made it?
So, what kind of hero are you, Ochako? Like, what do you specialize in?
You're able to make things...float, Ochako? I thought that was pretty basic magic.
Are you okay, Ochako? Need to take a break?
You look pretty nervous, Ochako. Do you want to stop for a minute?
Wow! That's such a cool costume, Ribbon Girl! It has a really exciting feeling to it!
Your outfit is incredible, Ribbon Girl! It makes you look tough and pretty at the same time!
So, what kind of Life do you live, Ribbon Girl? I mean, I can tell that you fight but, is there anything else?
You've been singing to yourself a lot, Ribbon Girl. I just want to say that your singing voice is very beautiful.
So, you're also an entertainer, Ribbon Girl? Wow, you're so talented!
Hey, Ribbon Girl? I've been wondering, how did you decide on your name? Ribbon Girl feels a little basic for someone like you.
Well, you're suddenly very flustered, Ladybug. What's wrong?
Feeling flustered, Ladybug? Should we stop for a minute and let you prepare?
Marinette, your face is as red as a strawberry. Please try to calm down.
Marinette, please don't panic. We're just playing a game.
Marinette? Who's this Chat Noir person you keep mentioning?
Hey, Marinette? You've mentioned someone named Adrien a few times. Who is that?
Is something wrong, Saki? You don't seem very enthusiastic.
Uh, Saki? Is everything okay? You sound kinda down.
Are you frightened, Saki? Don't be. Everything will be fine.
You don't have to be afraid, Saki. Everything is okay.
It's luck, Kizuna. Losing two times in a row isn't that much of a stretch.
Come on, Kizuna. Don't be a sore loser. You're still in the game, after all.
You're a princess, yet you're here playing this game, ~name~? You seem like one wild princess!
You're a princess, yet you're here playing this game, ~name~? You seem like one wild princess!
You're a princess, yet you're here playing this game, ~name~? You seem like one wild princess!
You're a princess, yet you're here playing this game, ~name~? You seem like one wild princess!
~Name~... is surprisingly cute! She's like a little girl!
~Name~... is surprisingly cute! She's like a little girl!
~Name~... is surprisingly cute! She's like a little girl!
This game is pretty neat!
I think I'm having fun!
It's your turn, ~name~!
This game is pretty neat!
I think I'm having fun!
It's your turn, ~name~!
Since I'm already naked, you shouldn't have any problems, ~name~.
Well, at least you still have clothing that you can take off, ~name~.
It could be worse, ~name~. You could be out of the game.
There's nothing to be afraid of, ~name~!
Which one of your clothes will you take off this time, ~name~?
I'm having a lot of fun with this! What about you, ~name~?
Well, I guess it's your turn, ~name~.
Just try thinking happy thoughts, ~name~.
Please don't get upset, ~name~.
Come on, ~name~. Make it exciting!
Go for something big please, ~name~.
Please hurry, ~name~.
Oh, don't be like that, N! We're here to have fun, so try to enjoy yourself.
Come on, N. This is a game, so just try to have fun, okay?
Aurora Village? That sounds lovely! What's it like!
Oh? And what is your home like, Dust?
"Warmblood"? I don't think I've ever heard of those before.
And, uh... what exactly does that mean, Dust?
Is there? I wasn't told of anything like that. Then again. I didn't really ask.
Uuuuh... I don't know, N. Is there?
I don't know what a few of those words mean, but it sounds really neat!
So it's like both a toy, and a memento for you, N? That's amazing!
That's still pretty impressive, N! I'm not really good at either of those things.
Either way, you seem like you're really smart, N! I'm not even sure what "psychology" is.
Um, are you going to need help with that, N?
N, are you having some trouble? Do you need some help?
That's a neat accessory, ~name~!
I think your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ pretty cool, ~name~!
What an interesting thing to wear...
Really? You're still going for small things like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?
How have I lost everything, and yet you still have that?
That's not exciting...
That's a neat accessory, ~name~!
I think your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ pretty cool, ~name~!
What an interesting thing to wear...
So why do you like to wear that accessory, name? Is it special somehow?
Don't be upset about losing your ~clothing~, ~name~. I'm sure you'll get ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ back when we're done!
I think that you've been doing a pretty good job so far, ~name~.
You're taking off something else along with your ~clothing~, right?
Er, there's more to it than that, right?
Is that really it? Nothing else?
Really?! Why?
Why would you only take off your ~clothing~ now, ~name~.
This makes me a little upset.
I don't think that's what's happening, N. Please calm down.
N, please try to calm down. This is just a friendly game.
How many clothes am I wearing again? Let's see... one, two, three, four...
I don't think I'm wearing more that eight items. Should I count to make sure?

That's incredible, N! I honestly didn't understand most of that, but it all sounded really smart. It makes me think of Hugh. He's always going on and on about things that he knows other people can't understand because he thinks it makes him look good. But you seem like you actually like it and aren't just trying to sound smart! Of course, you are smart though. It's funny, because I was just thinking, "Wouldn't be great to meet a really smart person I could actually get along with?" Not that smart people always hate me, they just seem to get annoyed that I don't always understand them. But you don't seem to care that much, N! You just seem happy to be able to openly talk about it. Wow! Once I start talking, I just can't stop! We'd better get back to the game...
I know how you feel, N. When I get scared, I tend to play with my necklace. It reminds me of my mother and that comforts me.
I can understand that, N. I do the same thing with my necklace whenever I get worried.
~clothing.ifPlural(Were they|Was it)~ made by an Alchemist or a Tailor?
What kind of stat bonuses did ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ give you, ~name~? Or was it just for cosmetics?
Accessories are so nice, aren't they?
~clothing.ifPlural(Were they|Was it)~ made by an Alchemist or a Tailor?
What kind of stat bonuses did ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ give you, ~name~? Or was it just for cosmetics?
Accessories are so nice, aren't they?
I thought you were starting to have fun with this, ~name~.
I really wanted something bigger.
I hope you're not gonna be like this for the rest of the game ~name~.
Anyway, Let's keep going!
I'm learning so much from this experience!
I wonder what Fizz would think of that accessory.

So, just your ~clothing~? Aww.
I was hoping for a little more...

So, what exactly are those things, Elesa?

So, how long can you run for, Emi? Without stopping?
Oh, pretty much everything! They can make potions, weapons, armor, tools and food! They can even help gather the materials!
They're an adventurer themselves, but they find and make everything they need, so they could do anything you'd need them to, Aella!
A potato? You're gonna have to tell me that story sometime, Aella!
Well, do you want to get it straightened, Tomoko? I know a pretty good beautician named Florina!
If you don't like it that way, I know a beautician named Florina that can help, Tomoko.
It looks really cool too, Megumin! It's like a smaller version of the Elder Wizard's robes!
Well, I hope you think it looks cool too, Megumin. It's important to like what you wear!
Wow! And you do that with a staff made of wood? Just imagine if you had a better one!
That's incredible, Megumin! I should introduce you to Jinx! She's an incredible magician once you get over the fact that she's a cat.
Oh. Okay, then maybe you'd like to meet Fizz? She makes magic accessories.
Uh, alright. Maybe Fizz, then? She's an alchemist too, but she also hates bombs.
So you do struggle with that? I'll talk to my friend and see what they can do.
Okay! I'll see what my friend can do for you, Megumin.
If you say so, Megumin. But if whatever is bothering you gets to be too much, just say something!
Okay, Megumin. But if you need someone to talk to, remember that I'm here.
Not at all, Rin! Let's just untie this...
I'd be happy to, Rin. Let's get that tie undone...
Wow! You must be really strong, Aella! You think you could hold me on your shoulders?
That's incredible, Aella! So, you could hold me on your shoulders too, right?
If it makes things easier for you, then it's perfectly fine, Ribbon Girl.
I think if you did that, I'd probably feel sorry for you, Ribbon Girl.
That's sounds like such an interesting weapon, Ribbon Girl!
I don't think I've ever heard of a weapon like that before!
W-wow. I guess that explains why Mustang is so harsh sometimes.
I-I see. Do you at least enjoy it, Meia?
No, it's nothing like that, Meia. I just... have a pretty good view of it from my home.
No, nothing like that, Meia. No fancy machines or anything, I just watch.
(She looks so happy talking about it.) That's amazing, Meia! Can you tell me more?
You seem to be really enthusiastic about it, Meia. It's great to have something you can enjoy.
I feel like you're being kind of condescending Palutena. It's not very pleasant.
You're being kind of rude, Palutena. Shouldn't you be kinder as a goddess?
I thought that we were talking about the ghost. Well you are a ghost, but I meant the bad one.
Sorry. But most ghosts I run into just try to attack me.
Clima- what now? What's that? Why does it have that name?
Well, you shouldn't be needing any weapons anyway, Nami. This is a friendly game after all.
You have a sister, Nami? What's she like? Do the two of you get along?
Log pose? Why's it called that? Why does your equipment have such weird names?
Did your staff... break? How did that happen?
Your wand ran out of magic? I didn't even know that could happen.
Oh? What's that, Nami? You dropped something.
Hey. Something fell out of your pocket, Nami. What is that?
Are you okay, Tomoko? You seem so nervous.

Tomoko? Is something wrong? Do you need to talk about it?

Just relax and try to enjoy yourself, Catria! This is a game, after all.
Well, this is a friendly game, Catria. Try to have fun with it.
Wow! That was a neat trick, Akko!

What happened to your wand, L'Arachel?
Did you run out of magic, L'Arachel? Are you low on stamina?
What ~clothing.ifPlural(interesting|an interesting)~ ~clothing~, ~name~. I like ~clothing.ifPlural(them!|it!)~

That's disappointing...

That isn't funny, ~name~.

Hm... Maybe I could ask my friend to make you one, Megumin.
No. Well, I don't think so, Megumin. But she does speak. and teach newcomers.
Well, I'm pretty sure she can't, Megumin. But she does cast really powerful magic.
I don't think she hates them. She just hates the fact that Flannel thinks of nothing but them.
No. She just prefers the accessory side of alchemy. She did make bottled fireworks once though.
I see. Sorry for scaring you, Megumin.
Oh. Sorry about that, Megumin.
You're not? Then why did you have that knife? Actually, why would a ghost even need a knife? Isn't your... ghostliness enough?
Why not! Hopefully we all have fun with this, Spooky!
You don't look like the bad ones, Spooky. The bad ones are all round and have a silly face. You're pretty!
You don't seem bad. You seem like a good girl to me.
You don't look like the bad ones, Spooky. The bad ones are all round and have a silly face. You're pretty!
You don't seem bad. You seem like a good girl to me.
Uh, I see... Well, just try to stay calm, Tomo.
Oh. I'm so sorry to hear that, Emi.
Oh my. I'm sorry that happened to you, Emi.
Oh. I'm so sorry to hear that, Emi.
Oh my. I'm sorry that happened to you, Emi.

Wow. Sounds like there's a pretty strict uniform where you come from, Megumin.
Oh, they're special clothing made for only the greatest magic users. Wearing them makes your stamina recover much faster!
They're special robes made for great magicians! My friend has a set, and when they wear it, they rarely ever get tired!
There! Got it!
And there! Got it.
Oooh! Butterflies! That's so neat, Zizou!
Wow! That's so cool, Zizou!
Ooh! How about we get my friend to make you a new wand, L'Arachel? One of godly quality!
I bet my friend could make you a much better wand, L'Arachel! Wanna come with me to go see them after this?

If this all gets to be too much for you, just say something, Chihiro.
Don't push yourself too hard, Chihiro. Say something if you need for us to stop.
If this all gets to be too much for you, just say something, Chihiro.

I wonder if Fizz could make an accessory like that.

~clothing.ifPlural(Are|Is)~ your ~clothing~ custom made, ~name~?
~clothing.ifPlural(Do|Does)~ your ~clothing~ have any special properties to ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~, name?

You're still handsome even if you lose it!

Futaba... are you okay? You seem nervous.

~clothing.ifPlural(Are|Is)~ your ~clothing~ at least great quality or better, ~name~?
